statements: SELECT * FROM knowledge_taxonomy;
SELECT topic_name FROM knowledge_taxonomy WHERE category = 'Science';
SELECT topic_name, category FROM knowledge_taxonomy WHERE topic_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_taxonomy WHERE category = 'Technology' AND topic_name LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT topic_id, topic_name FROM knowledge_taxonomy ORDER BY topic_name DESC;
SELECT topic_name, category FROM knowledge_taxonomy WHERE topic_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_taxonomy WHERE category = 'Science' ORDER BY topic_name DESC;
SELECT topic_name FROM knowledge_taxonomy WHERE category = 'Technology' AND topic_name LIKE '%Data%';
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM knowledge_taxonomy ORDER BY category;
SELECT topic_name, category FROM knowledge_taxonomy WHERE topic_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM knowledge_topics
SELECT topic_name, category_id FROM knowledge_topics
SELECT topic_id, topic_name, category_id FROM knowledge_topics WHERE category_id = 1
SELECT topic_id, topic_name FROM knowledge_topics WHERE topic_id = 3
SELECT * FROM knowledge_categories
SELECT * FROM knowledge_topics WHERE topic_id = 3;
SELECT topic_name, category_name FROM knowledge_topics JOIN knowledge_categories ON knowledge_topics.category_id = knowledge_categories.category_id;
SELECT topic_name FROM knowledge_topics WHERE category_id = 1 ORDER BY topic_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(topic_id) AS total_topics FROM knowledge_topics;
SELECT topic_name, category_name FROM knowledge_topics JOIN knowledge_categories ON knowledge_topics.category_id = knowledge_categories.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Science';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_topics;
SELECT topic_name, parent_topic_id FROM knowledge_topics WHERE topic_id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM topic_categories WHERE topic_id = 2;
SELECT topic_id1, topic_id2, relationship_type FROM topic_relationship WHERE relationship_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_topics WHERE parent_topic_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_topics;
SELECT topic_name, parent_topic_id FROM knowledge_topics WHERE topic_id = 3;
SELECT topic_name AS topic, category_name AS category FROM knowledge_topics JOIN topic_categories ON knowledge_topics.topic_id = topic_categories.topic_id;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_topics WHERE topic_name LIKE 'Data%';
SELECT relationship_type, topic_id1, topic_id2 FROM topic_relationship ORDER BY relationship_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM topics;
SELECT topic_name, parent_topic_id FROM topics WHERE topic_id = 1;
SELECT article_title, content FROM articles WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT article_id, article_title, content FROM articles WHERE article_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM topics WHERE topic_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE category_id = 10 ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT article_title, content FROM articles WHERE category_id = 5 AND article_id > 100;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE article_id = 50 GROUP BY tag_name;
SELECT topic_name, category_name, article_title FROM topics JOIN categories ON topics.topic_id = categories.topic_id JOIN articles ON categories.category_id = articles.category_id;
SELECT * FROM topics;
SELECT name, parent_id FROM topics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name FROM categories ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, topic_id FROM user_interests WHERE user_id = 1 AND topic_id = 2;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT t.name as topic_name, c.name as category_name FROM topics t JOIN topic_category tc ON t.id = tc.topic_id JOIN categories c ON tc.category_id = c.id;

SELECT u.username, t.name as topic_name, c.name as category_name FROM users u JOIN user_interests ui ON u.id = ui.user_id JOIN topics t ON ui.topic_id = t.id JOIN topic_category tc ON t.id = tc.topic_id JOIN categories c ON tc.category_id = c.id WHERE u.id = 1;
SELECT t.name as topic_name, COUNT(ui.user_id) as user_count FROM topics t LEFT JOIN user_interests ui ON t.id = ui.topic_id GROUP BY t.id ORDER BY user_count DESC;
